name: Europe Analytica
legal: Company Limited by Guarantee under English Law
goal:
Europe Analytica is a well established Public Affairs company, working as the EU “eyes and ears” of our overseas clientele offering full service public affairs consultancy and media relations.

Our consultants offer a wide range of experience across a number of policy areas and betwee them have fluent, English, French, Dutch, German, Greek, Italian and Spanish. As the team are in regular contact with key Commission officials and MEPs on a daily basis, you can be certain to receive all relevant political intelligence promptly and efficiently. Our staff attends parliamentary committees and hearings whenever they are convened and are able to update clients on regulatory developments affecting them and their interests.

Further information is available on request.
interests: Borders and Security, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Consumers, Culture, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Institutional affairs, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market, Sport, Trade, Youth
